title: Insecure Frontpage extensions configuration
overview: <paragraph>Incorrect permissions and/or missing authentication were discovered on FrontPage extensions used for publishing content. <paragraph></paragraph> A cyber-criminal might use this vulnerability to deface web sites and potentially gain remote code execution on the server.</paragraph>
remediation:
<paragraph> 1. Change the permissions on directories and files accessible via IIS
 2. Setup authentication and authorization for FrontPage extension access</paragraph>
